sentences.en: Devastators should be used to decimate infantry and attack units ranges.
sentences.cn: 毁灭战舰应该被用于远距离大批屠杀步兵和攻击单位.

sentences.en: Many adversities decimate the fluke numbers.
sentences.cn: 许多很不利的因素可使吸虫数量减少十分之一.

sentences.en: The banshees and attack the colossi as the terran ground forces decimate the protoss infantry.
sentences.cn: 隐匿的女妖轰炸机消灭了巨像,并配合地面部队消灭了异能者地面部队.

sentences.en: The banshees and attack the colossi the terran ground forces decimate the protoss infantry.
sentences.cn: 隐匿的女妖轰炸机消灭了巨像,并配合地面部队消灭了神族地面部队.

sentences.en: The population has been decimated by disease.
sentences.cn: 疾病导致大量人口死亡。

sentences.en: The young blue - skinned commander was able to decimate the intruders despite inferior weapons and numbers.
sentences.cn: 虽然在武器的数量和质量上都处于劣势,但这个年轻的蓝皮肤指挥官还是给入侵者造成重创.

words.tran_cn: 大批杀害；每十人杀一人；大量毁灭

trans.tran_cn: 十中抽一，取十分之一；大批杀害
trans.tran_en: to destroy a large part of something
